TITLE: COVID-19 Coronavirus Stats with Charts
DESCRIPTION: A free tool to visualize the latest stats on Coronavirus for any country with charts
INSTRUCTIONS: Type the name of the country you want to see, then hit enter or press the "Show Stats" button.
ERROR_LETMEKNOW: If you believe this is an error, please contact me and let me know

ABOUT_ME.title: About me
ABOUT_ME.line1: Hi! I'm Alessandro, Bitrey on the internet, a full-stack web developer based in Modena.
ABOUT_ME.line2: I've been focused on website creation for two years, from design to code, using the latest technologies while remaining oriented to the current demands of the internet world, especially mobile design.
ABOUT_ME.line3: If you need a website, don't hesitate to email me!

DATA_UPDATES.title: How is the data updated?
DATA_UPDATES.line1: The data is automatically updated every hour, however new stats are sent only 3 times a day.

DATA_SOURCE.title: But where does it come from?
DATA_SOURCE.line1: It comes from The Center for Systems Science and Engineering (CSSE) of JHU.
